reviews.content: Doesn’t remove ads in the Home tab, and the tab hiding doesn’t look perfect. Other than that it works perfectly even with the newest YouTube (ver. 15.05.4 as of this review)
All fine, old good nicely coded tweak ?
Doesn't remove video ads in the latest version. The last version it removes video ads for is 15.05.4. Hiding tabs works but some of the tab text shows at the bottom left corner of the screen.
Works perfectly on iOS 13 with no issues.
